name: Cortosis Rounds
description: Spend :advantage::advantage::advantage: or :triumph: from combat check to short out and deactivate target's lightsaber; lightsaber cannot be reactivated until the last initiative slot of the next round.

name: Refined Cortosis
description: Spend :advantage::advantage::advantage: or :triumph: on own combat check or :threat::threat::threat: or :despair: on attacker’s combat check to short out and deactivate target's lightsaber; lightsaber cannot be reactivated until the last initiative slot of the next round.

name: Dual-Phase
description: May change blade length once per encounter as an incidental. The next attack that turn made using this weapon ignores the target’s melee defense.

name: Forearm Grip
description: Decreases the additional difficulty of making Ranged (Heavy) checks with this weapon while engaged to an additional :difficulty:, rather than :average:.

name: Multi-optic Sight
description: Remove up to :setback::setback: on any checks to use this weapon due to smoke, darkness, or other environmental conditions that obstruct vision.

name: Telescopic Optical Sight
description: Reduce difficulty of combat checks at Long or Extreme range by 1.

name: Weapon Sling
description: Reduce the weapon’s Cumbersome rating by 1.
